PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: The game was very easy. No one won.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: The game was very easy, yet no one won.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: We studied a lot for the test. We still failed.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: We studied a lot for the test,yet we still failed.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: My mom works at a school. She takes me with her in the mornings.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: My mom works at a school,so  she takes me with her in the mornings.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: I have three brothers. Only one of them lives at my house.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: I have three brothers, yet  only one of them lives at my house.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: We love to pick fresh strawberries. We put them into delicious pies.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: We love to pick fresh strawberries, and we put them into delicious pies.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: My family is going to the beach. We can see the ocean.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: My family is going to the beach, so we can see the ocean.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: Arun can be a doctor. Arun can be a lawyer.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: Arun can be a doctor, or Arun can be a lawyer.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: Cricket is a great sport. I am not good at it.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: Cricket is a great sport, but I am not good at it.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: Tom is sick. He needs to go to the doctor.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: Tom is sick, so He needs to go to the doctor.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: My dad works in an office building. He has to take an elevator to the fourteenth floor.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Combine two sentences by using a comma and a conjunction.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: My dad works in an office building, and he has to take an elevator to the fourteenth floor.
